description: Regression test cases from past bugs

cases.issue: Backbone cutting failed for enzymes with asymmetric overhangs
GenBank feature positions incorrect after rotation
Homopolymer detection missed runs at fragment boundaries
Fragments with identical 3' ends caused incorrect assembly order
Overlap Tm calculation used simple GC method instead of nearest-neighbor
cases.note: Changed default from Tm_GC to Tm_NN for better accuracy
